website_summaries.verdict: Long and thin dive bag that can hold dive fins up to 29 inches in length, while being comfortable to carry.
pros: Uses two backpack-style shoulder straps to help you carry your gear comfortably
Has extra pockets to store your small items, including a water bottle pocket
Made with non-corrosive zippers for long-lasting performance
cons: On the small side when it comes to dive bags

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a long snorkel trip to the us ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a long snorkel trip to the us virgin island used the back pack for 4 weeks almost every day . We were able to fit 2 sets of fins 22 inch 1 snorkel 1 face mask as well as a full face snorkel mask. Had no issues . Back pack worked well
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The fin compartment is long enough for Mares Quatros (I wear smalls) with booties in the foot pocket. The accessory pocket holds plenty of stuff & the mask pocket is the perfect size. I leave the snorkel on & turn it across the top of the mask pocket & close the pocket. The mask defog I lay in in the bottom of the mask pocket before putting the mask in. You can cinch a towel into the bungee cross-arrangement. The bag is comfortable to carry, (I walk a 1.8 miles with it daily) & is well made with heavy canvas. It is strictly for snorkeling; dive gear will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: scubanow

customer_reviews.title: Large but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a large bag. We have had one just like it for several years. These bags are sturdy. Has made several snorkel and dive trips. They are large, however. It is the only bag i have found with the double (backpack) strap as opposed to the sling strap, thats why we like it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELL HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, with a few teaks it could be a great bag. Tall enough to fit snorkeling gear. But I wish it wasn't tapered as there would be more room for your booties and create more room so the outside zippered pouch could expand. Also, enough with single purpose pockets like the mask and sunglass holder, they are cute but pointless. The mask holder should be bigger with a zippered pocket or the velcro should be stronger, as it is I have concern that my mask could fall out which doesn't make me happy. The sunglass holder should be a pocket where you could stow stuff instead of just sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: David & Karol

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag but much too tall for me
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made fine bag but it is way too tall for my purposes. Appears to be built for scuba fins rather than snorkel sized ones. It’s a good four inches taller than my old snorkel bag that fits my (size 10) fins just right. Returned it because it’s too big for fitting into my suitcase which I need it to be able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: First, all my gear fits easily (fins, mask, snorkle, socks and GoPro). Lots of zippered storage places for glasses and accessories. Love the handle on top plus the double padded straps on back for longer hikes
customer_reviews.author: D. Masiello

customer_reviews.title: Fits a ton of gear!
customer_reviews.text: I just took this bag on a trip to Costa Rica and was really happy with it! We got it on every flight as a carry on without issue. It for two pairs of snorkels, fins, boots, and masks. Really impressed and happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: maxjaypower

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, excellent for snorkel gear on excursions!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to carry my snorkel gear on cruise excursions. It was perfect for me as there is plenty of extra room for towels and a change of clothes. I also love the little zipper pockets and places to store additional supplies. The adjustable straps make this a comfortable backpack to carry for longer excursions. The only thing I was disappointed in was one of the zipper pulls fell off after only a few uses. Otherwise this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heatherwhooo

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent choice. It held two sets of snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent choice. It held two sets of snorkel gear, and a laptop, and all the gopro gear. It fit nicely in the overhead, although, it wasn't "large enough" so the flight attendant told us to move it so the lady next to us could get 2 of her 3 large carry-ons in the overhead. Yeah... I don't think so! It was easy to carry. Kept several things dry while we were kayaking, and was easy enough to shake and empty the sand. Was really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoieB

customer_reviews.title: MUCH BETTER THAN THE DELUX SCUBA BAG
customer_reviews.text: MUCH BETTER THAN THE DELUX SCUBA BAG. HOLDS A LARGER MASK AND SECONDARY ZIPPER COMPARTMENT HAS MORE ROOM FOR REGULATOR. BETTER OVERALL.
customer_reviews.author: ERG

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag. I only wish that the pocket for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I only wish that the pocket for goggles had a little bit larger of a flap to cover more securely. Small things can fall out of this pocket. Also, the main comparment really can't hold much other than fins and booties (and this is a snug fit). If it was just a little larger, it would be more practical in its use, as you could also store a towel and maybe a regulator.
customer_reviews.author: patan245bronic767

customer_reviews.title: Got a used backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great, very well designed, however I got a used one!!! It was all scuffed and dusty and dirty inside!!! It arrived the day before leaving on vacation, so we had no time to exchange it. VERY disappointed in the seller for selling a used product as new. The case itself is great, you can easily fit in 2 sets of fins, masks, snorkels with pockets for water bottles and anti-fog drops etc. It's also great that you can use it as a backpack, freeing your hands.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved using this bag. We were able to fit two snorkel sets in it. With fins. It was durable enough to last a two week long vacation. And the backpack straps were handy
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Handy Pockets
customer_reviews.text: This bag proved perfect for my scuba vacation. I like the various pockets - mask pocket, tiny zippered pockets and large pocket separate from the fin compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and ability to wear as a backpack. Easy to pack and comfortable to wear and leaves hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Java Ray

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!  Don't buy one!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag twice, and never got it wet. I became ill, so it sat in the house for quite some time. When I later tried to open it to see what gear was inside, the zippers consisted of piles of white, powdery corrosion. When I pulled on the zipper tabs, they all fell off! All my stuff was trapped inside, being held hostage by this extremely corrosive bag that I had to break open in order to get my things out. Huge waste of $40 I spent on here!!
customer_reviews.author: Carib

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Bag works perfect for all of my snorkel gear. Mask, snorkel, fins fit with room to spare. The other pockets I was able to put my water shoes and flip flops in with no problems. Small side pocket works great to put car keys in. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Les Knapp

customer_reviews.title: nice, tall, fits a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: this can fit my husband's flippers & mine & our goggles in it (albeit a tight fit!) could hold all of 1 persons belongings (flippers, goggles, wetsuit, aqua shoes, small towel. but beware the front pouch if you're flying somewhere & checking this bag - the front pouch was almost completely ripped off by the time we arrived at our destination; otherwise bag held up well. bottom is fabric, not mesh, so bag needs overturned to dump sand out. didn't get stinky or smell like wet seaweed from the traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Use once a year, maybe youll be fine....
customer_reviews.text: Bag is good.... straps started ripping near were they connect to the bag/shoulder area. Used one week. That is were they should reinforce the straps. The mask bag is too small for a mask in a container. I hate placing my mask in the bag without the case. It could crease the mask. They didn't think that one through....
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Fits more than bargained for!
customer_reviews.text: Holds 2 pairs of Medium fins, dive boots, my mask, snorkel, my dive knife w/ sheath, towel and sunscreen. What more do you need! Fits well on my back, the weight is nicely distributed and rest evenly on the shoulders. All the stitching is thick and doesn't seem prone to tearing or coming apart at the seams. It is well ventilated to allow for drying on the go. Bottomline: I feel more than satisfied with my purchase and I would highly recommend this product to family and friends alike!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Size is actually 26"(H) x 9.5"(W) x 6"(D)
customer_reviews.text: The size of this bag is smaller than advertised. My fins which were under the dimensions listed in the description didn't fit. What a waste of time. You can't trust this product you can't trust this seller.
customer_reviews.author: D D.

customer_reviews.title: Form fit and function
customer_reviews.text: This pack is very well made I was able to fit my size 12 fins along with my wife’s size 8 plus snorkel and masks And two towels in the exterior bungees I wish it had one or two more outer compartments for a couple of water bottles
customer_reviews.author: blackvstar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: This was excactly what we beeded for our trip. Held both pairs of fins and snorkle masks.
customer_reviews.author: Hunley Dufrene

customer_reviews.title: holds 2 sets of fins, masks, & snorkels
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it's a backpack, it replaced one that we had for 20 years
customer_reviews.author: Candace McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my son who is taking a scuba diving class in college. His fins are 26 1/2" long and we couldn't find any bag in local stores to contain not only his fins but his mask, snorkel and diving shoes as well. He wanted a backpack style bag for easy carrying. This Promate bag is fantastic-well constructed, roomy, vented for easier drying of contents, and roomy enough for all his gear. He particularly likes the outer compartment for his mask-it's kept away from the other stuff and prevents scratching.Delivery was prompt. Both of us are extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: momeemaK

customer_reviews.title: Roomy back pack
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to hold our snorkel gear and it is perfect! There is room for two sets of gear including the fins, plus room to spare. It’s a great but!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow,  great,  saved out vacation.
customer_reviews.text: Was the trick with the double shoulder straps, hold big long fins and MORE.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Often times, I bike to the beach and had struggled to take my snorkeling gear with me. This makes it easy. I have room for fins, booties, mask, snorkel, my camera, a treasures bag, a towel, a water bottle, a lunch, and more! Seriously, there is more than enough room; but it isn't a bulky bag like those I have purchased in scuba stores. Love this bag and worth every penny! I do wish they had it in other colors particularly since I am purchasing one for my snorkel buddy now.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A.

customer_reviews.title: Scuba Equipment Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Backpack holds large fins, mask, snorkel and has room for additional things.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Snorkle Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We got them to travel with and so that when we were headed to a beach our hands would be free. Look like they will have room from everything we wanted to take with us. I especially like that they came from a dive shop so I knew that they would fit our gear and be functional.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trip.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last minute to take our gear to Key Largo. My gear and my husband's gear (his fins are huge) fit and he carried it on the plane as his personal item. Good quality material. Zippers work great. Has backpack straps and a carry handle, your choice of which is easier. Now it stores our gear in the basement on a hook ready for our next adventure. Definite recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel gear bag
customer_reviews.text: These were great bags for our snorkel gear! We went to Hawaii for 2 weeks and did quite a bit of snorkeling. I held all of our gear and more. We received lots of positive remarks, and many wanted to know where to get one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin smallwood

customer_reviews.title: It has multiple pockets for storing.
customer_reviews.text: I like this scuba gear backpack. It’s bigger than I expected and holds all of my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: My great beach bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great for your snorkel gear plus room for extra clothes, towel,and etc.
customer_reviews.author: jennice

customer_reviews.title: All this gear weighed a bit and the thin straps became uncomfortable pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.text: fit everything (long fins, mask,snorkel, vest , gloves, towels water bottles ect.) into this rig.I would of given a 5 if the shoulder pads had a bit more padding... All this gear weighed a bit and the thin straps became uncomfortable pretty quickly. ...otherwise a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swim great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Makes carrying gear smart and convenient. Meshed areas help promote drying.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: masks and snorkels along with rash guards and other "odsn ends like booties, gloves
customer_reviews.text: I can get both hers and my snorkel equipment in this backpack, we carry 2 sets of fins,masks and snorkels along with rash guards and other "odsn ends like booties, gloves, etc...Good Deal...
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Bialick

customer_reviews.title: Being a backpack style fin bag made it easy and comfortable to carry on my excursions
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Promate to carry my snorkle/fins, on my cruise. The Promate easly carried my 27in fins 2-snorkle mask an coral shoes. Being a backpack style fin bag made it easy and comfortable to carry on my excursions. The extra pouch I put my Olympus Tough Camera in
customer_reviews.author: V.J.

customer_reviews.title: Zippers Corroded
customer_reviews.text: Zippers corroded. Bag is now useless. Two seasons of use. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who used the bag two to three times a week. He really liked it a lot, perfect for his boots, fins, mask and few other items. Unfortunately only after about couple of months, the bottom started to rip at the seams! Eventually the whole bottom ripped off! Ended up tossing it in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great scuba bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bag for all your scuba gear. I bought this to use on a scuba diving trip to Belize and I wore it through the airport and everything and did not have any discomfort. I was able to fit everything I needed for my dives. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: It is we very well made and roomy enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is we very well made and roomy enough to accommodate all your snorkeling requirements with room for a change of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag last minute for my husband. It worked wonderfully AND it help both of our fins, mask and snorkels.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Adderholdt

customer_reviews.title: The bag is nice. Plenty enough room for all my snorkeling gear
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice. Plenty enough room for all my snorkeling gear. Only negative is the front pouch I’m guessing is designed to hold my mask is too small to fit my Cressi mask box. Overall not a bad bag. Worked well as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Have used these a lot for traveling, got snorkel ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used these a lot for traveling, got snorkel gear, owl on front, change of shorts and T shirt and other stuff in it. Has held up well, had for over a year and made 7 or 8 trips.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Pal

customer_reviews.title: ... fit 2 sets in this bag and it was perfect for a cruise we went on to the caribbean
customer_reviews.text: We fit 2 sets in this bag and it was perfect for a cruise we went on to the caribbean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my snorkel gear. Now I can trek ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my snorkel gear. Now I can trek a mile as needed with my stuff centered on my back. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: V. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Took as carry-on on the plane
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Took as carry-on on the plane. Fit 2 sets of fins/mask/snorkel and still had room for smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: The main case is roomy enough to store a towel with your fins.. The outer pocket offers extra space for your mask and snorkel and the smaller pocket can hold a small water bottle, keys, wallet etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Large & easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: It fit two fins, 3 inflatable life vest, regular snorkle mask and a full face snorkle mask and a few personal belongings. Big enough to carry adult gear
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Super Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for snorkeling! It's big enough to care my big flippers plus any personal item! I love it. I just wish in came in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Nekrazyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to organize my snorkel gear. Easy transport to the beach. Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great for our cruise
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a bit of time looking for a fin bag large enough to fit our snorkel gear for our cruise and finally settled on this one. So glad I did!!! We fit two sets of SCUBA fins, masks, and snorkels and still had room in the front pocket for our water shoes. The backpack straps were comfortable and convenient. I still can't believe how well this bag worked out for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: This bag is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is HUGE! Easily fits (2) sets of adult snorkel gear. Solid construction with comfortable backpack straps.
customer_reviews.author: Westley Anson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel bag worked great to our trip to Hawaii. It was rather big, but fit everything just fine. Kinda a pain to keep in my suitcase the whole trip, but PERFECT taking to the beach. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, nicely designed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our snorkeling trips. Fits all the gear. Nicely padded straps for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: IAmPicky

customer_reviews.title: Seam on bang ripped very easily even before going into the first trip
customer_reviews.text: Seam on bag ripped very easily even before going to the first trip. Seems like bad material or I was just out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Good product for daily pool visits
customer_reviews.text: Fins with other small gear fit fine in main compartment. Nice to have separate compartment for goggles. I wish there was an additional small, isolated compartment to keep keys, phone, paperwork stored and dry. Bungee nice for attaching barbell floats.
customer_reviews.author: Mulepick

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working just fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for two sets, though using it for one leaves enough room for a few drinks, lunch, towel, etc. Seems to be working just fine so far. Nice design, color as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: This bag was just what I wanted, comfort is all thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for snorting. Towels, drinks and snacks fit in bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bag for a scuba trip to Hawaii. It held all my gear including full fins, plus extra room for towels, sunscreen, lunch, etc. this is a very well made bag with great features like dual zippers,mesh pockets, and proper drainage capabilities. I also recommend the version with the front pocket for the mask. makes it even more convenient. I looked at a lot of bags before choosing this one and I am sure glad I picked this Bag. Couldn't have asked for better. A good choice and I highly recommend it for anybody who snorkels or dives from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: kokosman

customer_reviews.title: versatile pack
customer_reviews.text: When we go on cruises, sometimes we snorkel, other times just go ashore, This little pack will hold all your gear and then some. I use a really large dive fin and they fit just fine. Pack it all up and then fit in your suitcase and good to go....
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Herr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 sets of snorkel gear and more
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for island hopping. It was very convenient because my husband and I were able to fit everything that we needed with extra room left. The ventilation pockets worked well and the pack dries fast. Some bags only have one strap, but the two straps on this bag made it more comfortable to carry heavy items and helped with balancing when we had to trek through rocks, sand, etc. to get to our snorkeling destination.
customer_reviews.author: Char13

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits large scuba fins, mask snorkel. Extra pockets for misc stuff
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Westman

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great for all your small scuba equipment. I can fit my fins, mask, snorkel, 2 fins, mask defog, cell phone, and towel in it. Possibly a few other small items. Perfect and affordable. The back straps make for carrying the bag easy.
customer_reviews.author: rohicks

customer_reviews.title: Travels well and lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: I take this every time i go somewhere tropical. Full-size dive fins, mask, snorkel and still tons of room for sunscreen, snacks, towels etc. easy to shove under a plane seat or can be checked with luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Vickki

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought right before vacation, bag has literally been used less than a week, packed and unpacked a couple times a day, and it is ripping at the seam on the bottom, and on the padded strap!!! Piece of junk, paid double what I would have for a plain mesh bag, as we wanted the bag to last......😡
customer_reviews.author: Tina Laury

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest purchase. I had confidence this would be great but no one mentioned the extra little pockets it has. There's enough room to add a towel or a shorty wet suit like I have. There's even a zip pocket for a bottle of water. I am thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not much room for anything but your ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time I bring this out someone asks me about where I got it. Great product but not much room for anything but your gear and defogger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! It’s comfortable and large enough to fit 2 sets of snorkeling gear...with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Easy and light weight, this bag holds my fins, scuba mask and snorkel, shirt, shorts, and towel. Yeah, kinda love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Andi. L. N.

customer_reviews.title: This is a little small. It really can only ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a little small. It really can only fit the very essentials. Booties have to go under the exterior elastic laces.
customer_reviews.author: christine c

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snorkel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Until now I didn't have a snorkel bag for my gear. This one is perfect. Its well made and has a nice pouch for your goggles. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fabry

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect, fits my fins
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dive Bag. It is perfect, fits my fins, mask, 3 mil shorty and dive boots and works perfect for a carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Promate Backpack Style Snorkel Bag is Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to easily carry my snorkel gear to the water and back and it works well. Holds everything I need-fins, mask, snorkel, suntan lotion, water bottles, towel etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, plenty of space for my mask fins and a couple other things.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect for carrying and storing snorkel gear! It was important to us to have two straps so that the bag was easy to carry. We bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Redding

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic snorkeling bag for two
customer_reviews.text: This bag will hold mask, boots & fins for two people, is very comfortable and I love the backpack straps. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: lizzyt

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 sets of fins, masks, and vests with room
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra small pockets, and the bungee strap on the front. Double backpack straps makes carrying comfortable. You could probably fit a towel in it too, but we didn't try.
customer_reviews.author: MVNB

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seams starting opening up on my first dive trip. Returned for refund when I got back to the States.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size - will be taking on vaca in a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a trip to the Caribbean where you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a trip to the Caribbean where you don't want to miss a snorkeling opportunity, but carrying gear around can be impractical. This backpack was lightweight, with great compartments, even a place for a water bottle. High quality for a low price. Wish I would have discovered this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fortenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Took it on our last trip. It is big enough to hold not only his HUGE fins, but my mask as snorkel as well as his.
customer_reviews.author: Navigo

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly on a recent trip to west Palm. ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on a recent trip to west Palm. Ample storage for fins, mask, snorkel, booties, gloves, and towel. Used as a carry on bag for Allegiant and Delta flights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought this not realizing how much room it had. Its amazing and really sturdy made. Plenty of room or my dive fins, mask, snorkel, dive log book and regulator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart at backpack straps after wearing for less than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: jsb4g

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Took it all over Cozumel with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Took it all over Cozumel with my snorkel gear. Comfortable fit. Only complaint I would like to see a few more side pockets for wallet, camera, sunblock, etc. but still a great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This fits L fins, mask, snorkel. You can even fit your pair of boots with the fins. There is no space for wetsuits. just fins, mask and snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. I fit one pair of high end fins
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I fit one pair of high end fins, two snorkels, two mask in the bag itself.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the carrying handle it cuts into your hand
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the carrying handle it cuts into your hand. The case should have been designed with the fins up because it is top heavy and the pack wants flip when you carry it with one strap
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: We were able to comfortably carry two sets of snorkel masks and fins easily. We also had room for two pairs of water shoes and a 16 oz bottle of sunscreen in the large easy access pouch. The double strap made the bag very comfortable to carry even on a hike to a remote snorkel area. Good quality zippers. A must for travelers who want to carry their own snorkel equipment. We carried it on the airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love cressi products, great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Holds 2 pairs of fins, snorkels and masks. I can fit one mask in the front pouch and one mask in a plastic mask container in the top of the bag. The quality of the bag is great. Strong zippers, easy to carry. I read a lot of the reviews before making our choice and really happy our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but looks like it's gonna work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Master tech

customer_reviews.title: Seams Rip with first use
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough bag, but it is not nearly long to hold adult fins. Furthermore, the seams and materials are not sturdy. The entire bottom ripped out with the first use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 928 Motorhead

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkeling Pack for Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I just got back from Maui and used these packs almost everyday. It was nice to have everything organized with room for keys, glasses, towels, sunblock, rash guard, etc. The packs are well constructed and clean up easy. This was a great purchase for our trip.
customer_reviews.author: David Hartsfield

customer_reviews.title: just OK
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot, but after second time I used the metal inside fabric(to help the bag settle) poke through the fabric. It really made me upset. However this bag didn't tear apart. It still use this bag but it isn't worth for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pattarachit jaisawan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our honeymoon and it is plenty big for 2 sets of gear. We took it everywhere we went. Strap it on and go.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit my fins, 2 snorkels, mask, water shoes and wet suit in this bag. I love being able to carry all my gear in a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag! Holds two sets of skin gear easily. This includes masks inside their cases and a long fins (1 pair, the other pair is shorter) with the fin molds. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Eeelika

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag just before going to Mexico. I love to snorkel so I used it a lot. I fit both mine and my wife's gear no problem as well as my towels and hung my sandals on it. It was full but it is a really durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: gary

product_meta.title: PROMATE Backpack Style Bag For Mask, Snorkel, & Fins Scuba Diving Gear Snorkeling Surfing Travel Overnight Back Pack Bag
product_meta.description: Both practical, convenient and affordable backpack-style bags for Snorkeling Gear are perfect for vacation or carrying your snorkel gear to your local snorkeling spots. Both feature 600 denier nylon/PVC for highest protection, Heavy duty PVC coated mesh insertion at top & sides for ventilation, Nylon Top Carry Handle, Elastic cord on front for beach towels. See Product Features above for different size and some features to fits various needs. "
feature_bullets: Padded protective mask & snorkel bag w/zipper key pocket. Convenient zipper water bottle pouch. Exterior accessory pocket to organize all your gear.
#10 YKK non corrosive zipper on main compartment. #5 YKK non corrosive zipper on front pocket.
